unnormalised: Entertainment Alert: Is Ranbir Kapoor Moving On?
normalised: Entertainment Alert: Is Ranbir Kapoor Moving On?

unnormalised: Spotted! Ranbir Kapoor, looking dapper as ever, leaving Olive Bar & Kitchen in Bandra late last night with…wait for it…actress Kriti Sanon! Sources say they were laughing and joking for hours. Is this the start of a new Bollywood romance brewing, folks?
normalised: Spotted! Ranbir Kapoor, looking dapper as ever, leaving Olive Bar and Kitchen in Bandra late last night with…wait for it…actress Kriti Sanon! Sources say they were laughing and joking for hours. Is this the start of a new Bollywood romance brewing, folks?

unnormalised: Remember that sizzling on-screen chemistry between Ranbir and Alia in "Brahmastra"? Well, rumours are swirling that things have cooled off considerably between the couple.
normalised: Remember that sizzling on-screen chemistry between Ranbir and Alia in "Brahmastra"? Well, rumours are swirling that things have cooled off considerably between the couple.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Kriti was previously linked to Prabhas after "Adipurush", but both vehemently denied those rumours. Hmmm…
normalised: Meanwhile, Kriti was previously linked to Prabhas after "Adipurush", but both vehemently denied those rumours. Hmmm…

unnormalised: Adding fuel to the fire, insider sources at Film and Television Institute of India (FTII) say Ranbir was overheard discussing a potential movie script with Kriti during a recent impromptu visit to Pune. Coincidence? We think not!
normalised: Adding fuel to the fire, insider sources at F T I I say Ranbir was overheard discussing a potential movie script with Kriti during a recent impromptu visit to Pune. Coincidence? We think not!

unnormalised: Alia was noticeably absent from recent Kapoor family gatherings. Just saying! Stay tuned for more updates. This Bollywood drama is getting juicier by the minute!
